snippet: Investors appeared to hold to encouragement drawn from recent employment reports and news of progress in budget talks in Washington.
abstract: Stock market rises slightly, as investors appear to be encouraged by employment reports and news of progress in federal budget talks.
lead_paragraph: Investors appeared to hold to encouragement drawn from recent employment reports and news of progress in budget talks in Washington.

headline.main: Slight Gains in Market as Optimism Persists
headline.print_headline: Slight Gains in Market As Optimism Persists
